sen.j: 冷泉 為理（れいぜい ためただ、文政7年7月1日 (旧暦)（1824年7月26日） - 明治18年（1885年）4月25日）は日本の歌人。
sen.e: Tametada REIZEI (July 26, 1824 - April 25, 1885) was a Japanese poet.
Tametada REIZEI (July 26, 1824 - April 25, 1885) was a Japanese poet.
Tametada REIZEI (July 26, 1824 - April 25, 1885) was a Japanese poet.
The twentieth head of the Kami Reizei family.
He was the twentieth head of the Kami Reizei family.
He was the twentieth head of the Kami Reizei family.
His legal wife was a daughter of Takamitsu YANAGIHARA.
His legal wife was a daughter of Takamitsu YANAGIHARA.
His legal wife was a daughter of Takamitsu YANAGIHARA.

sen.j: 子は冷泉為紀、入江為守。
sen.e: His sons were Tamemoto REIZEI and Tamemori IRIE.
His sons were Tamemoto REIZEI and Tamemori IRIE.
His sons were Tamemoto REIZEI and Tamemori IRIE.

sen.j: 官位は正二位権中納言。
sen.e: His court rank was Shonii Gon Chunagon (Senior Second Rank, Provisional Vice-Councilor of State).
His court rank was Shonii Gon Chunagon (Senior Second Rank, Provisional Vice-Councilor of State).
